title: Solo Leveling
description: Sung Jin-Woo starts as the weakest of them all. But when a mysterious power awakens within him, he begins a journey to become the strongest hunter alive  As he rises from the bottom, Jin-Woo unlocks terrifying powers, commands an army of shadows, and becomes a force greater than even the strongest hunters and monsters.

title: Demon Slayer
description: A boy becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered.

title: One Piece
description: The story follows Monkey D. Luffy, a young man who gains the properties of rubber after unintentionally eating a Devil Fruit, and his adventures with the Straw Hat Pirates

title: Naruto
description: A young ninja who dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village, Konohagakure

title: Dan Da Dan
description: Momo Ayase and Ken Takakura , who believe in opposing supernatural forces

title: Dr.Stone
description: a scientific genius named Senku Ishigami awakens in a world where humanity has been petrified by a mysterious light.

title: New Saga
description: a magic swordsman named Kyle defeats the Demon King, but is then sent back in time to before the Great Invasion by a mysterious crimson crystal

title: Tokyo Revengers
description: Takemichi Hanagaki, a part-time worker who discovers he can time travel to his middle school days

title: Black Clover | Subtitled
description: Asta and Yuno are determined to become the Wizard King in a world of magic, even though Asta has none.

title: Black Butler | Subtitled
description: Ciel Phantomhive, with his demon butler Sebastian, solves mysteries in Victorian England.

title: Death Note | Subtitled
description: Light Yagami finds a notebook that can kill anyone and begins a moral battle with the genius detective L.

title: Dragon Ball Super | Subtitled
description: Goku and his friends defend Earth from powerful villains while constantly surpassing their limits.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen | Subtitled
description: Yuji Itadori joins a secret organization to fight curses after eating a powerful cursed object.

title: Haikyu!! | Subtitled
description: Shoyo Hinata, a passionate short volleyball player, aims to become the best despite his height.

title: Wind Breaker | Subtitled
description: Haruka Sakura joins Furin High to fight strong opponents and protect the weak with his fists.

title: Gachiakuta | Subtitled
description: Rudo is thrown into a trash-filled underworld and must fight using special weapons to survive.

title: Bleach | Subtitled
description: Ichigo Kurosaki becomes a Soul Reaper and protects the living world from evil spirits called Hollows.

title: The Shiunji Family Children | Subtitled
description: A boy lives with five beautiful adopted sisters, creating a mix of awkward, funny, and emotional moments.

title: The Daily Life of the Immortal King | Subtitled
description: Wang Ling is an OP high school student trying to hide his powers and live a normal school life.

title: My Hero Academia Dub| Sub
description: a boy born without superpowers  in a world where most people have them. Despite this, he dreams of becoming a hero, and after meeting the world's greatest hero, All Might

title: Attack on Titan Dub|Sub
description: In a world under siege by giant humanoid Titans, Eren Yeager joins the Scout Regiment to uncover the truth and take revenge after his city is destroyed.

title: Hunter x Hunter Dub|Sub
description: Young Gon Freecss becomes a Hunter to search for his missing father and faces dangerous trials while forming powerful friendships along the way.

title: One Punch Man Dub|Sub
description: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, grows bored and seeks a worthy challenge in a world full of monsters and heroes.

title: Blue Lock Dub|Sub
description: Japan's football union starts a controversial training camp to create the best striker in the world through an intense survival program known as Blue Lock.

title: Baki Dub|Sub
description: Baki Hanma trains endlessly to surpass his powerful father, Yujiro, and takes on brutal underground fights against the world’s deadliest warriors.

title: Hajime no Ippo Dub|Sub
description: A shy high schooler named Ippo discovers boxing as a way to gain confidence, pushing through intense training and emotional battles to rise in the ring.

title: Slam Dunk Dub|Sub
description: Delinquent Hanamichi Sakuragi joins his school’s basketball team to impress a girl but ends up falling in love with the game and chasing greatness.

title: MF Ghost Dub|Sub
description: In a future Japan where self-driving cars dominate, Kanata Rivington returns from England to compete in street racing and uncover secrets about his father.

title: God's Game We Play Dub|Sub
description: Fay joins a mysterious girl named Leshea in divine games created by gods, where logic, wit, and teamwork decide the fate of worlds.

title: The Promised Neverland Dub|Sub
description: Emma, Norman, and Ray uncover the dark secrets of their orphanage and plan a daring escape to save themselves and the other children from a grim fate.

title: Megalo Box Dub|Sub
description: In a futuristic society where gear-enhanced boxing is king, a mysterious underdog named Joe rises from the slums to challenge the champion in the ultimate Megalo Box tournament.

title: Chainsaw Man Dub|Sub
description: Denji, a debt-ridden devil hunter, merges with his pet devil Pochita and becomes Chainsaw Man. Pulled into the Public Safety Bureau, he battles devils while chasing simple dreams and facing brutal truths.

title: Dragon Ball Z Dub|Sub
description: Goku defends Earth from powerful foes like Vegeta, Frieza, Cell, and Majin Buu while training to become the strongest fighter in the universe.

title: The Rising of the Shield Hero Dub|Sub
description: Naofumi Iwatani, a gamer, is summoned to a parallel world along with three other heroes to fight against interdimensional monsters called Waves.

title: Kaiju No. 8 Sub
description: Kafka Hibino gains the power to transform into a kaiju while fighting monsters threatening humanity.

title: Oshi no Ko Sub|Dub
description: Reincarnated as the children of an idol, twins uncover the dark secrets of the entertainment world.

title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End Sub
description: An elf mage continues her journey long after defeating the Demon King, reflecting on mortality and bonds.

title: Mashle: Magic and Muscles Sub
description: In a magic-dominated world, Mash uses pure muscle strength to fight his way through a magical academy.

title: Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead Sub
description: Akira finally feels free after a zombie apocalypse begins, determined to live life fully before dying.

title: Hell's Paradise Sub
description: Condemned criminals explore a mysterious island filled with horrors in search of the Elixir of Life.

title: Spy x Family Sub|Dub
description: A spy, an assassin, and a telepath child form a fake family while hiding their true identities.

title: Jobless Reincarnation: Mushoku Tensei Sub|Dub
description: A man reincarnates into a fantasy world with great magical talent, seeking redemption in a new life.

title: To Your Eternity Sub|Dub
description: An immortal being takes different forms to experience humanity, love, and loss across time.

title: Tokyo Ghoul Sub|Dub
description: Kaneki becomes half-ghoul and struggles to survive between the human and ghoul worlds.
